title: New: Black Honey – Somebody Better
body:
Over the course of the past two or three years, **Black Honey** have built up one of the strongest back-catalogues of any new indie artist around, and _Somebody Better_, their first new material of 2017 is another fine addition.

A snarling yet strikingly addictive number, it’s a fitting tribute to their high energy, boisterous live shows. Check it out below.
